# dataminded Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    dataminded = {
      source = "hashicorp.com/dev/dataminded"
    }
  }
}

provider "dataminded" {
  host = "http://localhost"
  port = 3000
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `host` (String) Host address where the Data Minded API runs
- `port` (Number) Port of the Data Minded API host
